entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
